Title: Local History for Visual Studio
Description: Local History for Visual Studio automatically creates a history of your files every time they are saved. The history can be compared with the current version.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Local History for Visual Studio automatically creates a history of your files every time they are saved. The history can be compared with the current version.

Quick Start Guide
  1. Right click on a project item and click Local History to display the history.
  2. Double-click the revision to compare it with the latest version.
  3. View your code differences, it's that easy.
